src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? @ G ( RC , eat ( ) ) LP : I think ... [start] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : Ok . RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? [MASK] [end] LP : I really need to go to the toilet . @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I did n't understand your request , could you rephrase it ? ARI : How can I help you ? RC : We would like to go to the toilets . @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( toilet ) ) LP : Could you please come with me to the toilets ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . LP : I would like to go to the toilet . @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? [start] RC : Yes , I do . I have to go and see someone who 's hospitalised and I ca n't remember the ward . It 's room 17 . Can you please tell me where it is ? [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I ca n't remember the appointment time . Could you tell me ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [end] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cardiology_department ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . RC : Thank you , bye . LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day .

src: LP : Well it 's my first time here , I do n't know if this is the case for you . I 'd really like to um ... to be able , to be able to eat a little bit before going to my appointment , do you know where that is ? @ G ( LP , eat ( ) ) RC : You have a good idea ... LP : So um , is it ... RC : But I do n't know where we eat , so what do I do ? What do I do ? LP : So , can we eat ? Is there a designated area for visitors ? @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) RC : Before lunch , I 'd like to have breakfast . So where can we go ? @ G ( RC , eat ( breakfast ) ) LP : Well , no idea . RC : We 'll ask the question . LP : I have no idea where . First of all , if it 's open to outsiders . RC : I do n't know . LP : So um ... RC : We 'll ask him . RC : I do n't know what your name is . Can you give us information and tell us what your name is ? @ G ( LP+RC , get-info ( ari ( name ) ) ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . @ AG ( LP+RC , get-info ( ari ( name ) ) ) RC : Where 's the cafeteria ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : How can I help you ? ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . @ AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : On the ground floor . LP : And how do we get to the cafeteria ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . @ AG ( LP+RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) LP : The second building , um ... Do we take do we take the walkway ? ARI : Yes . [start] RC : I 'd really like to know what we can eat . I want a croissant and a large white coffee . [MASK] ARI : Today we have an endive salad to start , followed by a ham and cheese escalope with a side of mashed potato and a fruit compote for dessert . [MASK] LP : Yes , that 's for lunch . We would like a snack , would n't we ? Grab a coffee or breakfast , since we 're early for our appointment . [MASK] ARI : Of course . RC : And I 'd really like to go to the toilet too . [MASK] RC : Can you tell us where the toilets are ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . [MASK] RC : Second door on the right . Oh well , we 'll find it . LP : Next to so it 's next to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : Absolutely . [MASK] RC : I feel like it 's further away . That , that 's not on the ground floor . LP : I 'm having difficulty understanding what he 's saying . I ca n't hear very well . ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . [MASK] LP : In the corridor at the end of the room , on which side ? [MASK] RC : We 'll let it go . LP : We 'll leave it , we 'll leave it . RC : We 're going to eat something already . I 'm very hungry . [MASK] RC : Do you think it 's still time ? Until what time is breakfast served ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes . @ AG ( RC , eat ( breakfast ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LP : Um so , if I 've understood correctly , the toilets are next to the cafeteria . ARI : Absolutely . LP : I 'm having a hard time hearing actually . RC : Could you speak a little louder ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : You ca n't help us , so what are we going to do ? We 'll see something else maybe . LP : So um ... LP : So maybe we 'll go and have a look . Ah yes but well I think I 've forgotten my sheet . LP : I know I have an appointment but I do n't know what time it 's at . How can I find out my appointment time ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : Well , firstly do you know where to find um which doctor it is , which department , which specialty . LP : Is there a reception ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . LP : Um , how do I know what time my appointment is ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LP : Um ... And ... And where is um ... Um , I , I remember , I think it 's room 17 . But I 'm not sure . Where is room 17 ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift and it 's on the second floor . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LP : And you arrive directly in room 17 ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : Of course . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RC : Maybe it 's at the reception . Maybe there 's a service , a receptionist who will let you know who will tell you . @ G ( RC , go-to ( reception ) ) LP : So my appointment time will be confirmed in room 17 ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( place ) ) ) ARI : Thank you . See you around . Have a nice day . RC : Thank you . LP : Have a nice day .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Where can we eat ? @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) [start] RC : ARI , the person that I 'm accompanying feels intimidated by by you , and and they 'd like to know where they can eat . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LP : Are there toilets ? And where are they ? [MASK] RC : I 'm asking on behalf of the person that I 'm accompanying , who is asking me , well , where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] LP : Are they accessible by disabled people ? [MASK] RC : My ... My friend does n't walk very well , can he get into the toilets with his ... [MASK] LP : Wheelchair . RC : his wheelchair ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] LP : I have an appointment in room 17 , where is it ? [MASK] RC : And he 's a bit lost , he has an appointment , he 's been asked to go to , to go to room 17 . Could you tell us where to go , please ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : Is it wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] [end] RC : Is the lift wheelchair accessible ? Can he use the lift ? @ G ( LP+RC , get-info ( is_accessible ( lift ) ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . @ AG ( LP+RC , get-info ( is_accessible ( lift ) ) ) LP : I have an appointment at 10 AM , how long ... ah well yes ... RC : He has an appointment at 10 o'clock . Do you know if there is a waiting time , if he has time for a coffee or do we have to go straight to the treatment room ? @ G ( LP+RC , get-info ( clinic ( busyness ) ) ) ARI : No , there are n't too many people . The doctor will take you on time . @ AG ( LP+RC , get-info ( clinic ( busyness ) ) ) LP : I do n't know ... ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day .

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? [MASK] ARI : At 11 AM . [MASK] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . ARI : How can I help you ? LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [end] LP : Where are the toilets ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) LP : Right or left ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )
